roleset.name: attach studs to some object
roleset.note: STUD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stud' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic generation via verbnet. (from stud.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typically metaphorical
example.text: At a time when Jon Levy should be planning the biggest spring season in his dress company's 17 years, his work day is studded *trace* with intense moments of concern about one of his biggest customers, Campeau Corp.
example.arg: with intense moments of concern about one of his biggest customers , Campeau Corp

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Low test scores stud the school's performance record.
